statements: SELECT * FROM SpeedAndLocationData WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, speed FROM SpeedAndLocationData WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM SpeedAndLocationData WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT * FROM SpeedAndLocationData WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, timestamp FROM SpeedAndLocationData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, timestamp FROM SpeedAndLocationData WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM SpeedAndLocationData WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM SpeedAndLocationData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_records, AVG(speed) AS average_speed FROM SpeedAndLocationData
SELECT MAX(speed) AS max_speed, MIN(speed) AS min_speed FROM SpeedAndLocationData WHERE latitude < 0
SELECT * FROM speed_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM speed_data WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT * FROM location_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT MAX(speed), MIN(speed) FROM speed_data GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM speed_data WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM speed_data GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING avg_speed > 80;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM speed_data WHERE speed < 150 GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY max_speed DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM location_data GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_records > 5;
SELECT speed_data.vehicle_id, speed, latitude, longitude FROM speed_data JOIN location_data ON speed_data.vehicle_id = location_data.vehicle_id ORDER BY speed ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SpeedData;
SELECT id, speed, timestamp FROM SpeedData WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM LocationData WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 50.0;
SELECT id, fuel_consumption, efficiency_score FROM FuelEfficiency WHERE fuel_consumption < 10.0 ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM SpeedData JOIN FuelEfficiency ON SpeedData.vehicle_id = FuelEfficiency.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM SpeedData WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, vehicle_id, speed, timestamp FROM SpeedData WHERE vehicle_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM SpeedData GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING max_speed > 150;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM SpeedData GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY record_count DESC;
SELECT sd.id, sd.speed, ld.latitude, ld.longitude FROM SpeedData sd JOIN LocationData ld ON sd.vehicle_id = ld.vehicle_id WHERE sd.speed > 120 AND ld.latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM Speed_Data;
SELECT id, speed, timestamp FROM Location_Data WHERE vehicle_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model FROM Vehicle_Info WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM Fuel_Efficiency WHERE fuel_level < 0.5 AND efficiency_score > 8;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM Location_Data WHERE vehicle_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Speed_Data WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(speed) AS average_speed FROM Speed_Data GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 10 ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT v.make, v.model, f.fuel_level FROM Vehicle_Info v JOIN Fuel_Efficiency f ON v.vehicle_id = f.vehicle_id WHERE f.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT v.make, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM Vehicle_Info v JOIN Location_Data l ON v.vehicle_id = l.vehicle_id WHERE v.make = 'Toyota' ORDER BY l.timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT v.make, v.model, s.speed, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM Vehicle_Info v JOIN Speed_Data s ON v.vehicle_id = s.vehicle_id JOIN Location_Data l ON v.vehicle_id = l.vehicle_id WHERE s.speed < 50 AND l.latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 41.0 ORDER BY s.timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SpeedData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM SpeedData WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM VehicleInfo WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_level, timestamp FROM FuelData WHERE fuel_level < 0.5 ORDER BY fuel_level DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM LocationData WHERE latitude > 35 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SpeedData;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM SpeedData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM SpeedData WHERE speed > 100 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, timestamp FROM SpeedData JOIN VehicleInfo ON SpeedData.vehicle_id = VehicleInfo.vehicle_id WHERE VehicleInfo.manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT SpeedData.vehicle_id, SpeedData.speed, LocationData.latitude, LocationData.longitude FROM SpeedData INNER JOIN LocationData ON SpeedData.vehicle_id = LocationData.location_id;
